General.Name: RUSS-INVEST IC ao
General.Description: Public Joint-Stock Company Investment Company IC Russ-Invest, an investment company, operates in the financial market in Russia. It offers brokerage, trust management, Internet trading, sub-brokerage and agent, and custody services. The company was formerly known as Open Joint-Stock Company Investment Company IC Russ-Invest and changed its name to Public Joint-Stock Company Investment Company IC Russ-Invest in June 2016. Public Joint-Stock Company Investment Company IC Russ-Invest was founded in 1992 and is based in Moscow, Russia.
